description.value:
Trigger Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shield Block] causes your shield to break or be destroyed.

You're used to your shield breaking in the middle of battle, and you're prepared to use a backup or any convenient nearby object to defend yourself.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Interact] to draw a shield on your person or an unattended shield within your reach. If there is an object within your reach that could serve as an improvised shield-for example, a table or chair-you can Interact to draw it with this feat. The GM determines if something can be used as an improvised shield.

Your new shield isn't raised until you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Raise a Shield] action, as normal.
